title: Cozy at 2000 meters: Teide alternatives helping to ease altitude training camp logjam
content:
How a pair of British ex-pats are helping to make life easier for peloton's top pros near the top of Tenerife's towering volcano.

Read the full article at Cozy at 2000 meters: Teide alternatives helping to ease altitude training camp logjam on Velo.
author: ahood
